org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.asynch.stop

Interface StopService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StopServiceNodeImpl

    public interface StopService
    Contract for managing ESB stopping.

    It depends on service implementation if stopping is valid for one node or whole cluster.

    Since:
    0.4
    Author:
    Petr Juza

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelStopping()
      Cancels ESB stopping, switches back to normal mode.
      boolean isStopping()
      Is ESB stopping?
      void stop()
      Stop ESB, switches to stopping mode.

    • Method Detail

      • isStopping

        boolean isStopping()
        Is ESB stopping?
        Returns:
        true if ESB is in "stopping mode" otherwise false

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop ESB, switches to stopping mode. Can be called repeatedly.

        ESB won't to process next asynchronous messages.

      • cancelStopping

        void cancelStopping()
        Cancels ESB stopping, switches back to normal mode. Can be called repeatedly.
